Package teal.app

This package rovides base classes and interfaces for the generic application SimPlayerApp and stand-alone applications.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SimGUI
    Provides the default implementation of TGUI for the TEAL 3D simulations, used in both SimPlayer and TealSimApp.
    SimPlayer
    This provides a generic TSimulation presentation engine.
    SimPlayerApp
    Generic stand-alone wrapper application for SimPlayer.
    SimPlayerApplet
    Wrapper Applet for SimPlayer.
    SouthGUI
    Alternative user interface that places controls below the 3D viewer.
    TealBasicApp Deprecated 
    TealDefaultApp Deprecated 
    TealSimApp Deprecated 

Package teal.app Description

This package rovides base classes and interfaces for the generic application SimPlayerApp and stand-alone applications. A SimPlayer “plays” a TSimulation instance—that is it takes as input a TSimulation object and presents that TSimulation to the viewer. It implements the TFramework interface, which is the glue that holds all of the components in the TSimulation together.
